exceptions.exn: In environment A : Set A0, A1 : A eqA : A -> A -> Prop plusA : A -> A -> A invA : A -> A minusA, multA : A -> A -> A divA : A -> forall b : A, ~ eqA b A0 -> A cs : CoefStructure A A0 A1 eqA plusA invA minusA multA divA eqA_dec : forall a b : A, {eqA a b} + {~ eqA a b} n : nat ltM : mon n -> mon n -> Prop ltM_dec : forall a b : mon n, {ltM a b} + {ltM b a} + {a = b} os : OrderStructure (mon n) (zero_mon n) ltM (mult_mon n) a, b : Term A n Unable to unify "T2M (A:=A) (n:=n) (invTerm invA (n:=n) (multTerm multA (n:=n) (T1 A1 n) b))" with "T2M (A:=A) (n:=n) a".
The reference IHltM was not found in the current environment.

In environment A : Set A0, A1 : A eqA : A -> A -> Prop plusA : A -> A -> A invA : A -> A minusA, multA : A -> A -> A divA : A -> forall b : A, ~ eqA b A0 -> A cs : CoefStructure A A0 A1 eqA plusA invA minusA multA divA eqA_dec : forall a b : A, {eqA a b} + {~ eqA a b} n : nat ltM : mon n -> mon n -> Prop ltM_dec : forall a b : mon n, {ltM a b} + {ltM b a} + {a = b} os : OrderStructure (mon n) (zero_mon n) ltM (mult_mon n) a, b : Term A n Unable to unify "T2M (A:=A) (n:=n) (invTerm invA (n:=n) (let (b3, c3) := b in (multA A1 b3, mult_mon n (M1 n) c3)))" with "T2M (A:=A) (n:=n) a".

original: intros a b H. induction H. - reflexivity. - simpl. rewrite IHltM. reflexivity.
